amendment.description: To require the GAO to study the impact of price controls on pharmaceuticals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1114 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1114 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S8681-8682; text: CR S8682) To require the GAO to study the impact of price controls on pharmaceuticals.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1114 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1114 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Kyl.
